name: Silver Goblet of the Pristine Sea
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  In the years when the golden shroud covered the land, pure spring water had tobe hidden away in concealed mountain streams, and the Lochknights were born inthese sanctuaries.  The knights swear by armor of silver, to protect the spirits born from purewater, to protect their fellows who also keep faith in the one true font,resisting the omnipresent golden power that blotted out the sky and outshonethe sun.  But that is an ancient legend... Not long after the empire collapsed and sank,the knights who resisted the usurper shed their armor, and their stories werehidden in a tangled web of stories and ballads.
